slides.title: PagerDuty Integration
slides.content:
# PagerDuty Setup ğŸ”§

## Prometheus Alertmanager
```yaml
receivers:
- name: 'pagerduty-critical'
  pagerduty_configs:
  - service_key: 'xxxx'
    severity: critical
    description: '{{ .CommonAnnotations.summary }}'
```

## API Trigger
```bash
curl -X POST \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -d '{"routing_key":"xxx", "event_action":"trigger", "payload":{"summary":"High CPU"}}' \
  https://events.pagerduty.com/v2/enqueue
```

slides.title: Runbooks
slides.content:
# Runbooks ğŸ“–

Step-by-step response guides.

## Purpose
- Consistent response
- Faster resolution
- Knowledge sharing
- On-call training

## Template
```markdown
# Alert: High CPU Usage

## Description
CPU > 80% for 5+ minutes

## Impact
Slow response times

## Steps
1. Check top processes
2. Identify culprit
3. Scale or restart
```

slides.title: Runbook Content
slides.content:
# Writing Runbooks ğŸ“

## Essential Sections
| Section | Content |
|---------|--------|
| Description | What's happening |
| Impact | Who's affected |
| Diagnosis | How to investigate |
| Remediation | How to fix |
| Escalation | When to escalate |

## Best Practices
- âœ… Step-by-step commands
- âœ… Include examples
- âœ… Link to dashboards
- âœ… Keep updated
- âŒ Vague instructions

slides.title: Alert Routing
slides.content:
# Alert Routing ğŸš¦

## Routing Rules
```yaml
routes:
  - match:
      severity: critical
    receiver: pagerduty
  - match:
      team: frontend
    receiver: frontend-slack
  - receiver: default-email
```

## Grouping
```yaml

group_wait: 30s
group_interval: 5m
```

slides.title: SLO-Based Alerting
slides.content:
# SLO Alerting ğŸ“Š

## Error Budget
```
SLO: 99.9% availability
Error budget: 0.1% = 43 min/month

Alert when: Budget burn rate too high
```

## Multi-Window
```yaml
- alert: ErrorBudgetBurn
  expr: |
    (1 - rate(success[1h])) > 14.4 * 0.001
    and
    (1 - rate(success[5m])) > 14.4 * 0.001
```
